secret_rule: Only items that are mentioned in the lyrics of a Rolling Stones song can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "Brown sugar" and "wild horses".
I would like to make a new guess. Can I bring "fallen leaves" to the game?
I would like to make a new guess. Can I bring "sweet child" to the game?
I would like to make a new guess. Can I bring "good girls" to the game?
I would like to make a new guess. Can I bring "paint it black" to the game?
Yes, you can bring "paint it black."

Based on the examples and responses provided by the game master, it seems the rule is related to song titles by The Rolling Stones. "Brown sugar," "wild horses," and "paint it black" are all well-known songs by the band. Other guesses like "fallen leaves," "sweet child," and "good girls" do not fit this criterion, which is why they were not allowed.

So, the rule is: You can bring items that are titles of songs by The Rolling Stones.
